Lem -- Male Gutsy Halfling Bard: 5
Strength: 11 (+0) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 14 (+2) Intelligence: 12 (+1) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 19 (+4)
Background: Entertainer Alignment: Chaotic Good Deity: None
Experience: 4500/5000 Level: 5 Speed: 25 Size: Small Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 5/10
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 8 from any)
Goodies Strength: +1 Strength
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 2; Class: 2; General: 1; Skill: 2 Selectable Feature Count: Bard (Muse); Halfling (Heritage)
Feats: Breath Control; Cat Fall; Halfling Luck; Inspire Competence; Inspire Defense; Titan Slinger; Virtuosic Performer Bard Features: Ability Boost (Charisma); Ability Boosts; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Longsword; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Whip; Unarmed Attacks); Bard Feats; Bard Skills; Composition Spells; Defense Trained (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense); General Feats; Lightning Reflexes; Maestro; Muse; Occult Spellcasting; Perception Expert; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Signature Spells; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spell Trained (Occult) Entertainer Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Charisma, Dexterity; Choose 1 from any); Fascinating Performance; Skill Trained (Performance; Theater Lore) Halfling Features: Ability Boost (Dexterity; Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Ability Flaw (Strength); Ancestry Feats; Gutsy Halfling; Halfling Heritage; Keen Eyes

Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 2 from any)

General Feats: General Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Halfling Heritage: 1 selection
Maestro: Has the Lingering Composition feature
Muse: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 2 from any)
Halfling Luck: (F) Rerolls a failed skill check or save once per day
Perception: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +13 (dexterity; expert) Intimidation: +4 (charisma; untrained) Society: +8 (intelligence; trained)

Duplicated Training: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)

Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Fascinating Performance: Can fascinate 4 targets for 1 rd with a successful Performance vs. Will
Keen Eyes: R30' +2 Seek to find hidden creatures
Virtuosic Performer: +1 checks on a chosen Performance type
Combat
Hit Points: 56 Armor Class: 23 (dexterity (4 max); trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Shortsword (+11 1d6 P/S; dexterity; trained); Sling (+11 2d6 B R50'; dexterity; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +10
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Goodies Armor: +1 Armor Class
Goodies Striking Sling: +1 Damage dice
Keen Eyes: Reduces the flat check DC to target a concealed or hidden foe to 3 or 9
Titan Slinger: Slings inflict +1 damage die step vs. Large and larger targets
Save: Fortitude: +9 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +13 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats, successes vs. inhaled threats are critical successes, and can hold breath for 175 rd without suffocating
Cat Fall: Suffers 25' less damage from falling
Gutsy Halfling: Successful saves vs. emotion are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 3; O3: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Occult: +11 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 21 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Charm (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Counter Performance (O1 Foc Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation can substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Daze (OC1 Enc): (2) R60' Inflicts 4 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Faerie Fire (O2 Evo): (2) R120' 10' burst makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 5 min
Fear (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Ghost Sound (OC1 Ill): (2) R30' Creates sound equivalent to 4 humans shouting while sustained (heightened 3rd extends the range to 60'; 5th extends the range to 120')
Haste (O3 Tra): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Hideous Laughter (O2 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 and loss of reactions while sustained (save Will inflicts loss of reactions only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts prone for 1 rd, then slowed 1 and loss of reactions)
Inspire Competence (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) R60' Allows self to use Performance to Aid an ally skill check, with normal failure counting as a success, for 1 rd
Inspire Courage (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Inspire Defense (OC2 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 Armor Class and saves, plus resistance of half the spell level to physical damage, for 1 rd
Invisibility (O2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Light (OC1 Evo): (2) Touched object lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Lingering Composition (O1 Foc Enc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd, or 4 rd on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Magic Missile (O1 Evo): (1) R120' 1 missile (2 or 3 actions gives 2 or 3 missiles) inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 gives 1 additional missile per action)
Prestidigitation (OC1 Evo): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Slow (O3 Tra): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets)
Soothe (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 HP and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 HP)
Telekinetic Projectile (OC1 Evo): (2) Spell attack hurls a loose object that inflicts 1d6+4 HP of the appropriate damage type, or double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Inspire Competence: Knows the Inspire Competence occult cantrip
Inspire Defense: Knows the Inspire Defense occult cantrip
Lingering Composition: Knows the Lingering Composition occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Maestro: Knows the Soothe occult spell
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each level without learning a heightened version
Notes
* +1 Leather Armor
* Item Lesser elixir of life
* Item lesser thunderstone
* +1 Striking Sling
